Structs/DeleteModelResult.html#/s:20Lang.name: status
Structs/DeleteModelResult.html#/s:20Lang.abstract: OK indicates that the model was successfully deleted.

Structs/IdentifiedLanguages.html#/s:20La.name: languages
Structs/IdentifiedLanguages.html#/s:20La.abstract: A ranking of identified languages with confidence scores.

Structs/IdentifiableLanguage.html#/s:20L.name: language
Structs/IdentifiableLanguage.html#/s:20L.abstract: The language code for an identifiable language.

Structs/IdentifiableLanguages.html#/s:20.name: languages
Structs/IdentifiableLanguages.html#/s:20.abstract: A list of all languages that the service can identify.

Structs/IdentifiedLanguage.html#/s:20Lan.name: language
Structs/IdentifiedLanguage.html#/s:20Lan.abstract: The language code for an identified language.

Structs/IdentifiedLanguage.html#/s:20Lan.name: confidence
Structs/IdentifiedLanguage.html#/s:20Lan.abstract: The confidence score for the identified language.

Structs/TranslateRequest.html#/s:20Langu.name: text
Structs/TranslateRequest.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Input text in UTF-8 encoding. Multiple entries will result in multiple translations in the response.

Structs/TranslateRequest.html#/s:20Langu.name: modelID
Structs/TranslateRequest.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Model ID of the translation model to use. If this is specified, the source and target parameters will be ignored. The method requires either a model ID or both the source and target parameters.

Structs/TranslateRequest.html#/s:20Langu.name: source
Structs/TranslateRequest.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Language code of the source text language. Use with target as an alternative way to select a translation model. When source and target are set, and a model ID is not set, the system chooses a default model for the language pair (usually the model based on the news domain).

Structs/TranslateRequest.html#/s:20Langu.name: target
Structs/TranslateRequest.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Language code of the translation target language. Use with source as an alternative way to select a translation model.

Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.name: modelID
Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: A globally unique string that identifies the underlying model that is used for translation.

Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.name: name
Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Optional name that can be specified when the model is created.

Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.name: baseModelID
Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Model ID of the base model that was used to customize the model. If the model is not a custom model, this will be an empty string.

Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.name: customizable
Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Whether this model can be used as a base for customization. Customized models are not further customizable, and some base models are not customizable.

Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.name: defaultModel
Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Whether or not the model is a default model. A default model is the model for a given language pair that will be used when that language pair is specified in the source and target parameters.

Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.name: owner
Structs/TranslationModel.html#/s:20Langu.abstract: Either an empty string, indicating the model is not a custom model, or the ID of the service instance that created the model.

Structs/TranslationResult.html#/s:20Lang.name: wordCount
Structs/TranslationResult.html#/s:20Lang.abstract: Number of words in the input text.

Structs/TranslationResult.html#/s:20Lang.name: characterCount
Structs/TranslationResult.html#/s:20Lang.abstract: Number of characters in the input text.

Structs/TranslationResult.html#/s:20Lang.name: translations
Structs/TranslationResult.html#/s:20Lang.abstract: List of translation output in UTF-8, corresponding to the input text entries.

Structs.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV211.name: JSONWrapper
Structs.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV211.abstract: Used internally to serialize and deserialize JSON.

Structs/TranslationModels.html.name: TranslationModels
Structs/TranslationModels.html.abstract: The response type for listing existing translation models.

Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.name: noResponse
Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.abstract: No response was received from the server.

Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.name: noData
Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.abstract: No data was returned from the server.

Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.name: encodingError
Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.abstract: Failed to replace special characters in the

Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.name: fileManagerError
Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.abstract: FileManager failed to handle the given file.

Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.name: failure
Enums/RestError.html#/s:20LanguageTransl.abstract: An HTTP error with a status code and description.

Enums/JSON.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV.name: int
Enums/JSON.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV.abstract: A number value, represented as an integer.

Enums/JSON.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV.name: double
Enums/JSON.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV.abstract: A number value, represented as a double.

Enums/JSON.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV.name: init(from:)
Enums/JSON.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV.abstract: Initialize a JSON value from an encodable type.

Enums/JSON.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV.name: toValue(_:)
Enums/JSON.html#/s:20LanguageTranslatorV.abstract: Convert this JSON value to a decodable type.

Enums/JSON.html.name: JSON
Enums/JSON.html.abstract: A JSON value (one of string, number, object, array, true, false, or null).

Enums/RestError.html.name: RestError
Enums/RestError.html.abstract: An error from processing a network request or response.

Classes/LanguageTranslator.html#/s:20Lan.name: serviceURL
Classes/LanguageTranslator.html#/s:20Lan.abstract: The base URL to use when contacting the service.

Classes/LanguageTranslator.html#/s:20Lan.name: defaultHeaders
Classes/LanguageTranslator.html#/s:20Lan.abstract: The default HTTP headers for all requests to the service.

Classes/LanguageTranslator.html.name: LanguageTranslator
Classes/LanguageTranslator.html.abstract: IBM Watson Language Translator translates text from one language to another. The service offers multiple
